**Professional Experience**  
Sep 2024 - Jan 2025  
Jr 3D Artist  
PixelHarbor Studio  
• Original Render Creation: Developed a well-defined 3D assets, creating a base render to serve as a strong foundation for future edits.  
• Step-by-Step Visual Editing: Produced a series of consecutive renders (2, 3, 4, and 5), progressively adding or removing visual elements.  
• Consistent Modification Retention: Ensured that each stage retained all previous edits, maintaining a seamless progression toward the final render.  
• Final Render Integration: Combined all prior modifications into the final render, presenting a fully transformed and polished version of the project.  

Aug 2023 - Sep 2024  
Freelance 3D Artist & Graphic Design  
Indigo Static Collective | Madrid  
• 3D Asset Creation & Rendering: Designed and rendered stages, characters, and props based on client specifications, ensuring a cohesive visual style.  
• Composition & Post-Production: Edited and composed rendered elements using external editing software such as Photoshop to achieve the desired aesthetic.  
• Logo Design: Developed logos for the group, adhering to client guidelines while also exploring alternative designs and variations.  
• Mockup Creation: Designed realistic mockups to showcase how logos and visuals would appear on T-shirts, stickers, album covers, and other merchandise.  

Oct 2020 - Dec 2022  
Freelance 3D Artist  
Various Clients | Madrid  
• 3D Modeling & Animation: Creation of low-poly and stylized 3D animated avatars, including enviroment building, prop adition, particle system management and custom shader creation, adhering to client specifications and deadlines.  
• Client Collaboration: Worked closely with clients, understanding project requeriments, providing creative solutions and ensuring high-quality products, along with the client satisfaction.  
• Software Profiency: Utilized industry-standard software such as Blender, Autodesk Maya and Zbrush with some compositing programs like After Effects to produce visually compelling 3D assets.  
• Project Management: Managed multiple concurrent projects, adjusting workflows to meet client needs and project timelines.

• I am quite an enthusiast when it comes to games, relishing both video games and board games that are challenging and tough.

• Creating 3D models is something I greatly enjoy, allowing my imagination to flow and crafting the most intriguing ones.  
• I cherish the company of my cat and dog, spending time playing with them and showering them with love.
